summary:
Do you think that horses in skyrim should have a gender?
Now they have - this modification add a mares and stallions to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Hi, it is my first mod, so i hope that you will like it ;)
This simple mod share horses in skyrim on mares and stallions.
This mod include horses models with genitals, and textures. 
(It haven't got any sex animation and it won't).


See ma other mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61144/?

V.1.1
New texture for white horse
Shining red shadowmare eyes

[u][b]Compatibility:
[/b][/u]It should be compatible with mods:
1. Add new horses to skyrim. (but be shure that my mod is after them)
2. Change horses abilitys (speed, demage, ... )

[u][b]No Compatibility:[/b][/u]
1. Mods who contain new meshes and textures for horses.

[u][b]Installation:
[/b][/u]1. Download the file from nexus. ;)
2. Unpack it
3. Paste the .esp file, meshes and textures catalog to your Skyrim Data folder.

[u][b]Uninstallation:
[/b][/u]1. Delete the .esp file from your Skyrim Data folder.
2. Delete the catalog "horse" from Skyrim>Data>meshes>actors>
3. Delete the catalogs "malehorse" and "femalehorse" from Skyrim>Data>textures>actors>

[b][u]Credits:
[/u][/b]This mod wouldn't have been possible without the members of the Nexus community, please give them Kudos and endorsements:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3450704]Gary3[/url] - for create great mod which I created my mod ;)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9279/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D9279%26preview%3D&pUp=1

And permission to use it in this mod.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3121193]Shogun3d[/url] - for superior horse textures and permission to use them in this mod
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/596/?

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1772313]Xazomn[/url] - for horse texture and permission to use it in this mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3706

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/490678]zira[/url] - for horse textures and permission to use them in this mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2231

Thank you :D
author: RavenKZP
